items.title: Danish Digitalization, Data Science and AI conference 2024 (talk)
items.abstract: I was invited to give a talk titled `The Deep Generative Decoder: Encoder-less representation learning with flexible priors`.

items.title: Nordic AI Meet 2023 (poster)
items.abstract: I was invited to give a talk titled `The Deep Generative Decoder: Encoder-less representation learning with flexible priors`.

items.title: ISMB/ECCB 2023 (poster)
items.abstract: I presented my work on single cell generative modeling in form of a poster.

items.title: Seminar talk at Helmholtz Munich (talk)
items.abstract: I have the pleasure to give a talk at the Computational Health Department about Emma, Sarah and my work on the multiDGD.

items.title: Cellular Genetics methods matter seminar - Wellcome Sanger Institute (talk)
items.abstract: Great researchers such as GaÃ«l Varoquaux, Serge Belongie and a lot of bright fellow PhD students came together for a fun local summer school. This was a great opportunity to learn and share my work.

items.title: Seminar at MLLS (talk)
items.abstract: Our center for machine learning in life sciences is an amazing place to share knowledge and have great discussions. I had the pleasure to present my work on my first paper of the PhD.
